Header.title: Network is Inspiration
Header.paragraph: ManyaNet guarantees the fastest and most reliable broad band service in Malindi by use of fiber optic technology. Our dedicated Customer Service Team is available 24/7 via Email, Chat or direct Phone call to help you with connection services.

About.paragraph: We’re a startup targeting to be one of Malindi’s (Kenya) leading communications services companies. The solutions we sell are integral to modern life. Our purpose is as simple as it is ambitious: we connect for good. There are no limits to what people can do when they connect. And as technology changes our world, connections are becoming even more important to everyday life.Today, that’s truer than ever. The connections we make are helping solve the world’s biggest challenges such as the global pandemic, climate change and cyber security. Through the power of technology, we’re supporting customers to live, work and play together better.

Services.name: Internet Connection
Services.text: Never Miss a Moment With ManyaNet. Enjoy seamless and fast WIFI internet at home or business

Services.name: CCTV Security Installation
Services.text: Allows you to monitor activity in your home/business and compound anywhere, anytime.

Services.name: Cloud Migration
Services.text: We offer cloud migration services for your business, go global in miuntes without upfront costs. Free consultation and analysis from our cloud experts.

Services.name: Software Development
Services.text: We transform ideas into real life digital solutions. Our team of developers give you the cutting edge to the latest tech that can make your idea standout in the digital space

Services.name: Computer and IT network supplies
Services.text: We are a one stop shop for all your computer networking requirements, offering the latest industry standard gadgets to suite your needs.

Services.name: IoT Survey and setup
Services.text: What's the point of connection if your place ain't smart.ManyaNet IoT package involves free surveys and consultations to make your business or home 'SMART'

Features.title: Speed Guarantee
Features.text: Get the speed we promised or money back.

Features.title: Security Built In
Features.text: ManyaNet Broadband Shield offers advanced protection with Safe Search included, to help make the internet a safer place for your whole family at no extra cost.

Features.title: Cost Savings
Features.text: Who says internet has to be expensive? We certainly Don't! Get cheapest installation and monthly packages.

Features.title: Resolution Centre
Features.text: Dedicated Customer Service Team is available 24/7 via Email, Chat or direct Phone call to help you with connection services.
